About



Jacob Burkhart is a web developer in Austin, TX. He recently attended and completed a three month, intensive coding school (The Iron Yard) and learned the tools of the trade. He is now eager to share his new skills with the world and make an impact.

In his free time, Jacob loves watching movies, listening to music, and playing with his french bulldog, Murray. Jacob is also a huge beer lover, and is an active participant in and supporter of Austin's booming craft beer scene.To see more about Jacob's past work experience, check out his resum√©.

BeerPair.Me


BeerPair.me is a beer pairing application. Search a huge database of beers, and find out more info about them, including food pairings and recipes.
Check out the live site here.
See the Github repo here.

Gamelot


Gamelot is a web application made to visualize your board game collection, and see what game you can play in an allotted amount of time.
Check out the live site here.
See the Github repo here.

Chat Application


This chat app was a fun class project. I worked with a Ruby on Rails developer to create this!
